name: Dev Tools Shortcuts
body:
You can find all shortcuts here: [https://developer.chrome.com/devtools/docs/shortcuts 
](https://developer.chrome.com/devtools/docs/shortcuts) 

### Shortcuts Mac

    Open Developer Tools  Cmd + Opt + I
    Refresh the page  Cmd + R
    Text search within current file or panel  Cmd + F
    Text search across all sources  Cmd + Opt + F
    Undo change  Cmd + Z
    Save changes to local modifications  Cmd + S
    Go to line  Cmd + G
    Search by filename  Cmd + O
    Go to member  Cmd + Shift + O

### Shortcuts Windows

Open Developer Tools  

    F12, Ctrl + Shift+ I

Refresh the page  

     F5, Ctrl + R

Text search within current file or panel  

    Ctrl + F

Text search across all sources  

    Ctrl + Shift + F

Undo change  

    Ctrl + Z

Save changes to local modifications  

    Ctrl + S

Go to line  

    Ctrl + G

Search by filename  

    Ctrl + O

Go to member  

    Ctrl + Shift + O
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
